vecto.name: Bruschetta Cheese Bread
vecto.description: Fresh mozarrella cheese, tomatoes, basil and olive oil on italian bread

vecto.name: Garlic Rolls
vecto.description: Soft and fluffy dinner rolls brushed with delicious garlic herb butter.

vecto.name: Italiano Platter
vecto.description: Italian curIed meats, cheeses and marinated vegetables. A perfect appetizer for any occasion!

vecto.name: Buffalo shrimps
vecto.description: Tender yet crispy fried shrimps, served with delicious Chicken Wing Sauce. Ideal as an appetizer or indulgent snack or a light meal

vecto.name: French Fries
vecto.description: Snack or side dish made from potato strips that are deep-fried until crispy.

vecto.name: Fried Mushrooms
vecto.description: A crispy, golden-brown vegetable side dish made by cooking mushrooms

vecto.name: Baked Ziti

vecto.name: Eggplant Parmesan
vecto.description: A super cozy pasta casserole made with ziti pasta (a smooth tube-shaped pasta), red sauce, and a mix of cheeses

vecto.name: Frutti di Mare
vecto.description: An Italian pasta dish that features a variety of seafood in a light tomato sauce.

vecto.name: Panne alla Vodka
vecto.description: An Italian pasta dish of penne in a creamy vodka sauce. The sauce is made with tomatoes, vodka, cream, and Italian herbs.

vecto.name: Spaghetti Aglio
vecto.description: A simple yet flavorful Italian pasta dish made primarily with spaghetti noodles, garlic, olive oil, and a touch of seasonings.

vecto.name: Penne alla Arrabbiata
vecto.description: A Roman pasta dish made with penne pasta in a spicy tomato sauce.

vecto.name: Florentine Pizza
vecto.description: A silky spinach, tangy tomato and salty Parma ham sit neatly on a traditional pizza base, topped with a perfectly cooked egg

vecto.name: Greek Pizza
vecto.description: A mediterranean-style pizza with a soft, thick crust and toppings like olives, feta, tomatoes, and onions.

vecto.name: Margherita Pizza
vecto.description: A classic Italian pizza featuring a thin crust topped with fresh tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

vecto.name: Pesto Pizza
vecto.description: This coal-fired masterpiece promises an appealing twist on tradition with its trio of fresh mozzarella, savory basil pesto, and basil leaves.

vecto.name: Pineapple and Ham Pizza
vecto.description: A classic Hawaiian Pizza combines pizza sauce, cheese, cooked ham, and pineapple.

vecto.name: Tortellini
vecto.description: A ring-shaped pasta that's stuffed with cheese, meat, or vegetables.

vecto.name: Antipasto
vecto.description: A plate of cured meats, cheeses, and vegetables that's typically served at the beginning of an Italian meal.

vecto.name: Blue Cheese
vecto.description: A cheese with blue veins or marbling caused by edible mold.

vecto.name: Caesar Salad
vecto.description: A green salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, and a dressing of olive oil, lemon juice, anchovies, garlic, and Parmesan cheese.

vecto.name: Chef salad
vecto.description: An American salad that typically includes lettuce, meat, cheese, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, and cucumbers.

vecto.name: Greek Salad
vecto.description: A tossed salad made with tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, olives, feta cheese, and dressed with olive oil, oregano, vinegar, or lemon juice.

vecto.name: Parmesan Cheese
vecto.description: A hard, granular, Italian cheese made from cow's milk, known for its strong, nutty flavor, crumbly texture, and pale yellow color

vecto.name: Meatball Parmesan
vecto.description: An Italian dish of meatballs in marinara sauce, topped with cheese and served in a bread roll or casserole.

vecto.name: Ham and Cheese
vecto.description: Remains of pig, cured and sliced with a topping of Leicester cheese and a kiss of egg yolk sauce (a form of mayonnaise) in a round bread roll.

vecto.name: Mozzarella Caprese
vecto.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil and virgin olive oil.

vecto.name: Panini Rosina
vecto.description: Italian ham, roasted red peppers, fresh mozzarella, extra virgin olive oil & spices. Served on rustic Italian bread & grilled to perfection.

vecto.name: Steak Sandwich and Fries
vecto.description: Sandwich made with sliced grilled or fried steak on bread, often with toppings like cheese, onions, and peppers, served alongside a portion of crispy french fries

vecto.name: Tuna Fish
vecto.description: Elongated, robust, and streamlined fishes grilled with peppers and onions
